body: This seems to be an invalid NodeDef, since min/max of `QuantizeAndDequantizeV2` are always from input not attribute? Maybe you want `ops::FakeQuantWithMinMaxXXX` from `bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/cc/ops/array_ops.h`?
